summary.overview: This JCL performs automated data backup and job submission for the card demonstration system. It creates a backup copy of card demo FTP test data and then submits a follow-up job for continued processing.
business_functions: Create backup copy of card demonstration FTP test dataset
Submit secondary JCL job for automated execution and workflow continuation

INTRDRJ1.JCL.program_overview: IBM utility for dataset backup and copy operations
IBM utility for copying JCL to internal reader for job submission

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo FTP Test File (AWS.M2.CARDEMO.FTP.TEST)
datasource_summary.function: Source file containing test data that needs to be backed up. Used as input for file copy operations.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo FTP Test Backup File (AWS.M2.CARDEMO.FTP.TEST.BKUP)
datasource_summary.business_name: Card Demo FTP Test Backup File
datasource_summary.function: Backup file that stores copied data from the source test file. Serves as a backup copy for data preservation.

datasource_summary.name: Card Demo Internal Reader JCL Member (AWS.M2.CARDDEMO.JCL(INTRDRJ2))
datasource_summary.business_name: Card Demo Internal Reader JCL Member
datasource_summary.function: JCL member containing job control statements that will be submitted to the internal reader for automated job execution.

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["IBM utility for dataset backup and copy operations (IDCAMS) "]
    IEBGENER["IBM utility for copying JCL to internal reader for job submission (IEBGENER) "]
